Headline: #52 Kedzie, #52A South Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/50th
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie, 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, California, 51st and Kedzie : due to, street blockage near Kedzie/50th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie, #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, California, 51st and Kedzie : due to, street blockage near Kedzie/50th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #51 51st Temporary Reroute near Kedzie/51st
ShortDescription: 51 51st  buses temp. rerouted WB: 51st, California, 47th, Kedzie and Orange Line Terminal; EB Orange Line, 47th, California and 51st: near Kedzie/51st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#51 51st  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kedzie/51st due to street blockage near Kedzie/51st.

Westbound buses will operate via 51st, California, 47th, Kedzie and Orange Line Terminal including the normal route streets.

Eastbound buses will operate via Orange Line Terminal, 47th, California and 51st

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #93 California/Dodge Temporary Reroute near Dodge/Church
ShortDescription: 93 California/Dodge buses temp. rerouted in both directions, due to police department activity near Dodge/Church.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police department activity near Dodge/Church.

Northbound buses will operate via Dodge, Church, Benson, and resume normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Emerson, Ashbury, Church, Dodge, and resume normal route..

Allow extra travel time.
